laboratory_examinations.findings: Mixed bacterial flora-culture screened for B. fragilis, C. perfringens, and C. septicum. None isolated.

The liver demonstrates a mildly increased echotexture without evidence of focal lesion. No intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Portal vein is patent and shows normal hepatopetal flow. The gallbladder demonstrates one shadowing stone within it with focal gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 5 mm. An impacted shadowing stone in the cystic duct measuring approximately 13 x 15 mm. No pericholecystic fluid is seen. CBD measures 5 mm.
